attributes.additional_details: Across the country families are facing financial hardship, businesses are struggling and failing, livelihoods are being destroyed. These funds can be better spent elsewhere, invest in communities and the people rather than enriching a few shareholders.
attributes.background: The news the Boris plans to spaff money up the wall on arms in the middle of a pandemic is abhorrent. There's no magic money tree so stop behaving like there is one.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561041
